Viciously murder them with an army of ninjas. 

My stealthy hill.

Kills your army of Ninjas with two Contubernium's of Roman Legionaries.

My hill

Sends an army of mages to burn the legionaries to ash.

My hill (with a fine layer of human ash covering it).

I turn the ash into soap.. the natural enemy of the mage!

My hill now!

Hm. Let's throw [**this chemical**](http://pipeline.corante.com/archives/2008/02/26/sand_wont_save_you_this_time.php) on your precious hill, shall we? Kekekekekekekeke.

My extremely noxious hill.

I know you, and you couldn't safely handle enough chlorine trifluoride to light a match ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

My hill.

Use a robot army able to contain enough chlorine trifluoride to light the Earth / Kerbin

My hill

I send in sufficient kerbality and humanity defenses to stop your army and I take over the hill.

My hill.

Meh. I just BURN IT!

My BURNT hill.

.... That's what that chemical does. It burns everything. You can't destroy it with fire, it *is* the very essence of fire. It will set set fire to things you didn't know were flame-retarded. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

\*adds more chlorine trifluoride to the hill, along with HCl to dissolve any residual steel and iron\*

My puddle of extremely dangerous chemicals.

I deploy a storm of sulfuric acid (acid), hydrogen chloride (acid), and vinegar (contains acetic acid, an acid), then ammonia (base) and magnesium hydroxide (base) and water (moderate like base) to neutralize the ocean of acid. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

My ocean of neutralized and tainted water.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-11-10T02:00:01Z" title="11/10/2013 02:00  AM" data-short="10 yr">November 10, 2013</time> by Designer225**

Oh, boy, you have no idea. I add a small amount of chlorine trifluoride to the mix, and even the *water itself* catches on fire. And you as well, naturally, after the hydrofluoric acid starts to attack your nervous system.

My flambÃƒÂ©ed ocean.

Then the Earth explodes.

I found an Earth-like planet and claimed a hill. My celestial hill.

I go to that planet's moon and claim a crater.

My reverse-hill.
I knock the moon out of its orbit, killing you both. My moon-sized hill on a foreign world.

I cool myself down to 0.04 kelvin, putting myself in quantum physics. I then go to two hills at once, since quantum physics allow that. no matter what you do, with only one move, you can't claim my hill(s)!
... sends a missile to each hill, destroying the quantum effect and killing you. I then cool both hills to 0.04 kelvin and entangle them. My quantum entangled hills. I claim one, I claim the other.

Both hills are too close to the star, thus quickly increasing the temperature to 12,000 K (Assume the star is an O-type main sequence star.), quickly melting your hills. I then took the lava planets and knock you out of function by spraying more acids. My lava planets.

The hill has been discovered abandoned and neutralized by the rainfalls of a newly formed planet after everybody died from acid exposure. 

I will now be planting a flag on this to mark the future site of a chocolate factory.

I broke your flag and plant mine here and start building a chocolate factory.

My chocolate factory.

I open a portal to a parallel universe and find a hill.

My inter-dimensional hill.

I implode the crater, all its dimensional copies and its surroundings with a flux bomb. My single dimensional, fluxed crater

I also call in a planetay SRB bombardment, blowing up the chocolate factory and evaporating the flag. My crater and utterly ruined planet.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-11-29T19:22:43Z" title="11/29/2013 07:22  PM" data-short="10 yr">November 29, 2013</time> by OdinYggd**

The flag is replaced, and teams are dispatched through a parallel universe device to place flags on all possible hilltops in all possible universes. 

The factory shall be rebuilt in honor of the moderation team.

We call in a mini sized death star and blow up your factory and the flag.

My superheated crater!

I then fires a laser to destroy your Death Star (it may be powerful, but it will be delicate) and cooled down the earth.

My nitrogen-rich crater (because why not?).
